metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9211 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description:
There is a reachable assertion abort in the function write_long_string_missing_values() in data/sys-file-writer.c in libdata.a in GNU PSPP 1.2.0 that will lead to denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9211` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

pspp - 1.2.0-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pspp package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.0-5').
